name: Fish Fighters
description:
Fish an enemy and fight em in an epic battle!

Fish Fighters is a small short game in which we tried to make simple fishing games more fun by adding more mechanics to the fishing game, a fighting game and an fun art style to the ridiculous setting. 

Controls for Keyboard

Fishing:

X: Cast out fishing rod

Z (QWERTY)/ Y(QWERTZ): Reel in

Arrow keys: Move left and right

Space: Quick time event

Fighting: 

Z (QWERTY)/ Y(QWERTZ): High attack

X: Low attack

Arrow keys up/down/right: Jump/ duck/ dodge back
